faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Can I test the platform before paying?
faq.a1: Yes, we offer a 30-day free trial for all plans, without requiring a credit card. You have full access to the features of your chosen plan and can cancel at any time.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept payments by bank card (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfer and invoice with deferred payment for the Enterprise plan. All invoices are issued in accordance with applicable tax legislation.
faq.q3: Can I cancel or change the plan at any time?
faq.a3: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time, and the price difference is calculated proportionally. Upon cancellation, you have access until the end of the current billing period. There are no penalties or hidden fees.
faq.q4: How is my company's data protected?
faq.a4: Data is stored on secure servers in the EU, with end-to-end encryption (AES-256). We are GDPR compliant and perform daily automatic backups and quarterly security audits.
faq.q5: Can I switch from Starter to Professional at any time?
faq.a5: Yes, you can upgrade instantly. The price difference is calculated pro-rata for the remaining period. Migration happens instantly, without data loss.
faq.q6: Is there a discount for annual payment?
faq.a6: The displayed prices are annual rates. Compared to monthly payment, annual payment means a saving of approximately 20%. For multi-year plans (3+ years) or multiple organizations, contact us for a personalized offer.
